author: holiman
content: Oh actually, I'm not sure I can make that time. I miscalculated, and it's right in the worst possible slot on a friday evening (and it's 95 minutes!?)

author: Deleted User
content: We can move it, I am fine with that. It may also be useful to do some pre-discussion about what this call is supposed to be about and what everyone wants to get from it

author: Deleted User
content: I do not have any agenda for it, so I will not be "driving" the meeting, but I am happy to participate if it is helpful

author: timbeiko
content:
The previous discussion we had had was about trying to give an overview of each of our approaches and especially some of the edge cases / tricky bits. Not sure 90 mins is needed, happy to change the duration. Perhaps it's worth it for each team to post a written summary of what they are working on beforehand so that others can get up to speed, if they have one? I know Geth had this article: https://blog.ethereum.org/2020/07/17/ask-about-geth-snapshot-acceleration


As for the time, does 14:00 UTC work better?

author: Deleted User
content: Ok, so it is probably ok if I cannot join. Then perhaps you can move it back to the original time, 14:00 UTC this Friday, and I will try to join, but if I can't, I can't
